articles.title: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots
articles.mainIdea: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots
articles.summary: Reuters: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots. Italy's antitrust authority (AGCM) on Wednesday ordered Meta Platforms to suspend contractual terms that could ​shut rival AI chatbots out of WhatsApp, as it investigates ‌the U.S. tech group for suspected abuse of a dominant position. A spokesperson for ‌Meta called the decision "fundamentally flawed," and said the emergence of AI chatbots "put a strain on our systems that they were not designed to support".
